text: This is a list of diseases of foliage plants belonging to the family Araucariaceae. ==Plant species== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=3| Plant species |- |A ||Araucaria heterophylla ||Norfolk Island Pine |- |} ==Fungal diseases== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=3| Fungal diseases |- |Code ||Scientifice Name ||Common Name |- |Bleeding canker ||Dothiorella spp. Lasiodiplodia theobromae = Botryodiplodia theobromae ||A |- |Cylindrocladium root rot ||Cylindrocladium spp. ||A |- |Needle blight ||Colletotrichum gloeosporioides = Colletotrichum derridis ||A |- |Pythium root rot ||Pythium spp. ||A |- |} ==References== *Common Names of Diseases, The American Phytopathological Society Foliage plant (Araucariacea)
title: List of foliage plant diseases (Araucariaceae)
